name: Power Game
description:
Take on the challenge of Brian McCarthy's Irish board game classic. Play against the AI or your friends in this digitized version of the popular strategy game.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In tense turn-based rounds, you hone your strategic advantage and aim to take control of your opponent's gear. Will you make your opponent turn your way? You control the direction!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can finally play Ireland's bestselling board game (10 million games sold worldwide) on the go. Refine your masterplan on your smartphone or tablet any time you like in "The Power Game".
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

With a clever strategy, you command the board and rob your opponent of their chance at victory with each turn.

- Play by yourself or with a friend on one device.
- Exercise your strategist genius
- Turn your opponent's gear YOUR way
- The Irish classic with over 10 million board games sold
